title: Mission Bug?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I've won games, why isn't it updating?

replies.body: Oh okay, I have to get the kills AS Kayn. Thanks for clarifying! :)

I went ahead and looked into your match history to see who you've been using in the recent matches, and it doesn't look like you've used Kayn at all. At the top of those missions, it states that each one needs to be completed as either Shadow Assassin or Darkin form Kayn.
